title: Linux Log Analysis and Auditing
subtitle: Master system logging, auditd, and security event correlation for incident response
learning_objectives: Master journalctl for systemd log analysis
Configure and use auditd for security monitoring
Correlate security events across multiple logs

content.text: Linux logging is your security camera system. Every authentication attempt, file access, and system error is recorded. Master log analysis to detect breaches, investigate incidents, and maintain security.

post_assessment.question: What is the primary tool for querying systemd journal logs?
post_assessment.explanation: journalctl is the command-line interface to the systemd journal, providing powerful filtering and querying capabilities.

author: CyberLearn Platform
